author: wrowe
msg: Movin on over from 1.3.13-dev : this patch fixes the problem of nasty
popup windows alerting an Admin that the isapi isn't working, and
simplifies mod_isapi by relying on dso.

author: rbb
msg: If we determine that a platform does not have DSO support, then it makes
no sense to try to build DSO support.  This changes stops us from doing

author: bjh
msg: Add some headers needed for a clean compile on OS/2.

author: rbb
msg: Update send_the_file to fall back to a read/write loop on platforms
without sendfile.  This also makes the apr_hdtr_t type available on
all platforms, regardless of whether apr_sendfile is defined or not.
Submitted by:	Brian Havard and Ryan Bloom

author: gstein
msg: doc nit and I missed a change to Makefile.in.
